_source.text: 2. The black - they put on blinders, choose a side usually based on who they know, and even though they are mostly in the dark about what really happened cast blame with extreme prejudice 3. The green - secretly envious this type will lay blame to an innocent because in their mind they would have done much better and would relish the chance to show that 4. The yellow - without spine, they only echo what they may have heard others say and even then only in the shadows 5.

text: 2. **The** **black** - they put on blinders, choose a side usually based on who they know, and even though they are mostly in the dark about what really happened cast blame with extreme prejudice 3. The green - secretly envious this type will lay blame to an innocent **because** in their mind they would have done much **better** and would relish the chance to **show** that 4. The yellow - without spine, they only echo what they may have heard others say and even then only in **the** **shadows** 5.
